text: Gomez's web-footed salamander (Bolitoglossa gomezi) is a species of salamander in the family Plethodontidae. It is found in Costa Rica and Panama. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. ==References== * Wake, Savage & Hanken, 2007. Bolitoglossa gomezi. 2012 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 11 October 2012. Category:Bolitoglossa Category:Amphibians described in 2007
title: Gómez's web-footed salamander
